newsitem.title: USA: Intl Nursing Q1 loss vs profit.
newsitem.headline: Intl Nursing Q1 loss vs profit.

text.p: Shr loss applicable to common shareholders
Net loss applicable to common shareholders
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: International Nursing Services Inc said the differences between net income (loss) and net income (loss) applicable to common stockholders relates to the imputation and subsequent amortization of additional preferred stock dividends in 1997 and the recapture of preferred stock dividends in 1996.
Revenues increased in the first quarter of 1997 primarily from the acquisitions of Ellis Health Services Inc, STAT Health Care Services Inc and TherAmerica.
